name: runtime_brief_basic
issueBody: Unhandled exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains no elements. Occurs on Windows 11 with .NET 8.0.1 when clicking Sync.

extractedFields.error_message: Unhandled exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains no elements

playbook: Capture runtime version, error message, stack trace, and repro steps.
repoDocs: README: To run the app, use dotnet run and click Sync to start the process.
